## DotProductNode class

Calculates the dot product of two vectors

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class DotProductNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns a.x \* b.x + a.y \* b.y + ... (sum of component-wise products). Both inputs must be the same vector type (vec2, vec3, or vec4). Always returns a float scalar.

Used for: - Calculating angles between vectors (via cosine) - Projecting one vector onto another - Lighting calculations (Lambert's cosine law)
